name: Breed (itch)
description: An entry for the Godot Wild Jam #13.  The theme was "Merge". This is my 1st game jam attempt, and my 2nd game ever.  Couldn't figure out how to get the compile to work for html, and I made the Mac and Linux versions blind.  Hope it works! Some of the assets are from Kenney, but most of them were created by me or my daughter.  You can probably tell the difference.
